mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fc_seller ORDER BY sellerNumber
SELECT * FROM fc_menu ORDER By menuNumber ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fc_customerCart (customerNumber, sellerNumber, menuNumber, menuOptionNumber, cartQuantity) values (#{customerNumber}, #{sellerNumber}, #{menuNumber}, #{menuOptionNumber}, 1)
INSERT INTO fc_customerOrder (customerNumber, sellerNumber, customerOrderTotalPrice) VALUES (#{customerNumber} ,#{sellerNumber},#{customerOrderTotalPrice})

INSERT INTO fc_customerOrderMenu (customerNumber, customerOrderNumber, menuNumber, menuOptionNumber, orderMenuQuantity) VALUES (#{customerNumber}, #{customerOrderNumber}, #{menuNumber}, #{menuOptionNumber}, #{orderMenuQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT com.customerNumber ,com.orderMenuQuantity, com.customerOrderNumber, mo.menuOptionName, mo.menuOptionContent, mo.menuOptionPrice, m.menuName, m.menuPrice ,m.menuImage, co.customerOrderTotalPrice,co.customerOrderCreatedAt FROM fc_customerOrderMenu com JOIN fc_menuOption mo ON mo.menuOptionNumber = com.menuOptionNumber JOIN fc_menu m ON m.menuNumber = com.menuNumber JOIN fc_customerOrder co ON co.customerOrderNumber = com.customerOrderNumber WHERE com.customerNumber = #{customerNumber}
SELECT deliveryAddress FROM fc_customerAddress WHERE customerNumber = #{customerNumber}
